gateway/module_install.description: Install a new module - Upload, Install, and Restart (generic checkbox selectors for Ignition 8.3.1+)
gateway/module_install.author: Nigel G
gateway/module_install.release_notes: Fixed checkbox selectors for Ignition 8.3.3 compatibility — uses generic input[type=checkbox] instead of text matching

gateway/gateway_restart.description: Restart Ignition Gateway from restart notification bar (assumes already logged in)
gateway/gateway_restart.author: Nigel G
gateway/gateway_restart.release_notes: Added generic checkbox fallback selector for Ignition 8.3.3 compatibility

gateway/gateway_login.description: Login to Ignition Gateway with credentials (supports Ignition 8.3 identity provider flow)
gateway/gateway_login.author: Nigel G
gateway/gateway_login.release_notes: Initial library release — base dependency for all gateway playbooks

gateway/module_uninstall.description: Uninstall an existing module from the Gateway and restart
gateway/module_uninstall.author: Nigel G
gateway/module_uninstall.release_notes: Initial library release — dependency for module_upgrade

gateway/backup_gateway.author: Nigel G
gateway/backup_gateway.release_notes: Initial library release — standalone gateway backup playbook

gateway/reset_trial.description: Reset Gateway trial license activation timer
gateway/reset_trial.author: Nigel G
gateway/reset_trial.release_notes: Initial library release — standalone trial reset playbook

gateway/api_key_setup.description: Create an Ignition 8.3 API key and store it in the Toolbox API Explorer
gateway/api_key_setup.author: Nigel G
gateway/api_key_setup.release_notes: Initial library release — API key creation and Toolbox integration

gateway/module_upgrade.description: Upgrade an existing module - Uninstall old version then install new version (auto-detects module from .modl file)
gateway/module_upgrade.author: Nigel G
gateway/module_upgrade.release_notes: Consolidated 5 module-specific upgrade playbooks into single generic playbook

perspective/test_buttons.description: Systematically test all buttons on a Perspective page - click and verify expected behavior
perspective/test_buttons.author: Nigel G
perspective/test_buttons.release_notes: Initial library release - button testing playbook

perspective/test_discovery_debug.author: Nigel G
perspective/test_discovery_debug.release_notes: Initial library release - discovery debug playbook

perspective/test_docks.description: Systematically test components that open docked windows, popups, or modals
perspective/test_docks.author: Nigel G
perspective/test_docks.release_notes: Initial library release - dock/popup testing playbook

perspective/test_inputs.description: Systematically test all input fields and setpoints on a Perspective page - fill, verify, and validate
perspective/test_inputs.author: Nigel G
perspective/test_inputs.release_notes: Initial library release - input field testing playbook

perspective/test_suite_master.description: Comprehensive test suite that runs all specialized perspective tests and compiles results
perspective/test_suite_master.author: Nigel G
perspective/test_suite_master.release_notes: Initial library release - master test orchestrator

perspective/test_verification_examples.description: Demonstrates the new browser verification step types (text, attribute, state)
perspective/test_verification_examples.author: Nigel G
perspective/test_verification_examples.release_notes: Initial library release - verification step type examples

perspective/test_visual_consistency.description: Test visual consistency across components - alignment, fonts, colors, spacing
perspective/test_visual_consistency.author: Nigel G
perspective/test_visual_consistency.release_notes: Initial library release - visual consistency testing playbook
